item.title: Version 1.2.1
item.description: - We added a function that sends a welcome message to new drivers when they sign up. - We added a "No thanks" button so a driver can decline an order instantly which also mutes the notifications for that order. - We fixed an issued causing background music from other apps to stop when restarting the app. - We added a price list in the app menu for drivers to compare the various car types. - We added an "Instruction videos" link in the app menu offering help for the drivers.
